```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library('UniprotR')
library("tidyverse")

```

```{r}
path = paste(params$workingDir, params$resultsDir, sep = "")
acc_files = list.files(path = path, pattern = "UNIPROT_*")

acc = GetAccessionList(paste(path, acc_files[[1]], sep=""))
acc_conv = ConvertID(acc, ID_from = "ENSEMBL_ID" , ID_to = "ACC")
acc2 = data.frame(acc = acc_conv[[2]], stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
for (i in 1:length(acc2)){
  split_id = split(acc2, ",")
  print(split_id)
}


```
